name: Q-mon
description:
GMTK-mon
Jack LaLonde
Submission for 2020 GMTK Game Jam

I did not finish in time but follow me if you
want to see me finish this concept!

You get to train the blue monkey.

Each monkey is hooked up to a neural network
that makes its decisions, and you change the network by 
praising or scolding the monkey.

Every three seconds, each monkey chooses one of three actions:
1. Fire a projectile attack
2. Move one square
3. Do nothing

TL;DR
Yyou don't control your monkey,
but you can train it by praising its move or scolding it.
